metadata.dc:author: Bagán, J V
Campos, A
Basterra, J
Zapater, E
Martorell, M
metadata.dc:description: Minor salivary gland tumors represent about 10-15% of salivary gland tumors. The most frequently seen histological type are pleomorphic adenomas, which are usually located at the hard palate. Clinical and pathological features of 7 cases are reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Adenoma pleomorfo de glándula salivar accesoria.
[Pleomorphic adenoma of the minor salivary gland].
